description: Section 73 application (Minor Material amendment) to vary condition (approved plans) of planning permission P081070 dated 19 September 2008 (as amended by planning permission P081070(MA01) dated 24 October 2011) for the refurbishment and conversion of existing Grade II Listed building from factory (Use Class B1c) into 50 self contained student rooms providing 56 bed spaces (Sui generis) with ancillary office, communal, plant and laundry areas, involving removal of existing rear factory roof and construction of replacement roof extension to provide a new third floor. The material amendments are:1] Provision of additional studios, increasing number of rooms from 50 to 53; 2] Retention and extension of existing external fire escape; 3] Internal and external alterations; and 4] Removal of staircase to upper floor.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The approved refuse storage provision shall be completed prior to occupation. The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the plans approved and no change therefrom shall take place without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

REASON: To protect the amenity of neighbouring properties and to ensure adequate provision of refuse storage in accordance with policy CS11 of the Core Strategy 2011.
